posts.post_content:
Pretty cool card.  The registration is off, and there is some stray red ink that matches the ink on his lips.  It's a nice VG card even without the more interesting aspects.

$395 obo

Check or Money Order only, please.  Price includes shipping (within the U.S.).

Let me know if you'd like additional pics or scans.
This card now lives in an SGC 40 case.  Still available.
